channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Lenovo XClarity Controller (XCC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Lenovo XClarity Controller (XCC)

item.title: CVE-2023-4606|2024-08-02T07:31:06.613Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller%20%28xcc%29
item.description:
An authenticated XCC user with Read-Only permission can change a different user’s password through a crafted API command.
This affects ThinkSystem v2 and v3 servers with XCC; ThinkSystem v1 servers are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2023-4608|2024-08-02T07:31:06.539Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller%20%28xcc%29
item.description:
An authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges can perform blind SQL injection in limited cases through a crafted API command.
This affects ThinkSystem v2 and v3 servers with XCC; ThinkSystem v1 servers are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2023-4607|2024-08-02T07:31:06.682Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller%20%28xcc%29
item.description: An authenticated XCC user can change permissions for any user through a crafted API command.
